name: FDockTabStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an SDockTab

CloseButtonStyle: Style used for the close button
NormalBrush: Brush used when this tab is in its normal state
ColorOverlayTabBrush: Brush used to overlay a given color onto this tab
ColorOverlayIconBrush: Brush used to overlay a given color onto this tab
ForegroundBrush: Brush used when this tab is in the foreground
HoveredBrush: Brush used when this tab is hovered over
ContentAreaBrush: Brush used by the SDockingTabStack to draw the content associated with this tab; Documents, Apps, and Tool Panels have different backgrounds
TabWellBrush: Brush used by the SDockingTabStack to draw the content associated with this tab; Documents, Apps, and Tool Panels have different backgrounds
IconSize: Icon size for icons in this tab
OverlapWidth: The width that this tab will overlap with side-by-side tabs
FlashColor: Color used when flashing this tab
NormalForegroundColor: Foreground Color when the tab is not hovered, pressed, active or in the foreground
ForegroundForegroundColor: Foreground Color when this tab is the Foreground tab
IconBorderPadding: The padding applied to the border around the tab icon
